name: Business Intelligence Direct
description: Business Intelligence Direct (BID Marketing) is a specialist professional services, technology, and financial services telemarketing agency. As a company, we have the clear objective of "being the engine that drives our clients’ sales growth.” We achieve this goal through the design and delivery of successful lead generation, appointment-focused telemarketing, and inside sales campaigns. Established in 1998, BID Marketing has delivered over 5,000 demand generation campaigns.
